content.query:
-- Parse the JSON files using JSON_VALUE
select top 10 
    JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.component') AS component, 
    JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.deviceId') as deviceId, 
    JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.enqueuedTime') as enqueuedTime,
    JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.telemetry.temperature') as temperature,
    jsondoc 
from 
    openrowset( 
        BULK 'https://gondor2.dfs.core.windows.net/iotcentral/ae903b55-ae40-4e38-860f-2970c7593735/8/2022/10/27/10/29/kqkbejgjh2cas.json',
        format = 'csv', 
        fieldterminator ='0x0b', 
        fieldquote = '0x0b' 
    ) with (jsondoc nvarchar(max)) as rows 
where JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.component') is not null
order by JSON_VALUE(jsondoc, '$.enqueuedTime') desc
